descriptionHtml:
I've always thought the unique daggers sucked ass verse the weapons you can make in game. This mod helps to fix that. These are the best unique daggers in the game without you using exploits or mods. I've always thought lore weapons/boss wep should be the best in the game. Hell everyone does not like smithing.


3 Unique Daggers Fix
----------------------------------------------
Mehrunes' Razor: Base 12

Ignores normal weapon resistance, hits target with fire damage for 25 for 2secs per hit and also has a chance to crit 25 points. Has a 1% chance to instant kill a target.
------------------------------------
Keening: base 11

Ignores normal weapon resistance, drains magic, health and stamina for 25 points per sec. Also Has a chance to crit 20 points.
-------------------------------------------
Blade of Woe: base 13


Ignores normal weapon resistance, drains 25 health points from the enemy and also has a chance to crit 30 points.
author: Bob100
